member.name: T:Testy.Files.TemporaryTestDirectory
member.summary: Represents (and possibly creates) a test directory, which is automatically cleaned up when instance is disposed

member.name: M:Testy.Files.TemporaryTestDirectory.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates the temp test directory. If is specified, the directory will be created as a subdirectory of that root. Otherwise, the base directory of the current appdomain/appcontest is used. The directory will automatically be created if is true.

member.name: M:Testy.Files.TemporaryTestDirectory.op_Implicit(Testy.Files.TemporaryTestDirectory)~System.String
member.summary: Implicitly casts this temp test dir to a string

member.name: M:Testy.Files.TemporaryTestDirectory.ToString
member.summary: Returns the path of the test dir

member.name: T:Testy.FixtureBase
member.summary: Fixture base on which tests can be based

member.name: M:Testy.FixtureBase.InnerSetUp
member.summary: Called by NUnit before each test. Will call the virtual method, which can be overridden in concrete test fixtures.

member.name: M:Testy.FixtureBase.SetUp
member.summary: Override this to be invoked before each test

member.name: M:Testy.FixtureBase.InnerTearDown
member.summary: Called by NUnit after each test. Will call .

member.name: M:Testy.FixtureBase.Using``1(``0)
member.summary: Registers the given in the disposables stack, to be disposed when is called (if not before, then at least when NUnit calls the method).

member.name: M:Testy.FixtureBase.CleanUpDisposables
member.summary: Disposes all disposables registered using . The disposables are disposed in reverse order.

member.name: T:Testy.General.DisposableCallback
member.summary: Action that gets called when the object is disposed

member.summary: Creates the disposable callback with the given
